solution_line_template: Hannah's earnings from the cookies is {num_cookies} x ${price_per_cookie} = $<<{num_cookies}*{price_per_cookie}={cookie_earnings}>>{cookie_earnings}.
Her earnings from the cupcakes is {num_cupcakes} x ${price_per_cupcake} = $<<{num_cupcakes}*{price_per_cupcake}={cupcake_earnings}>>{cupcake_earnings}.
Her total earnings for the cupcakes and cookies is ${cookie_earnings} + ${cupcake_earnings} = $<<{cookie_earnings}+{cupcake_earnings}={total_earnings}>>{total_earnings}.
The cost of {num_spoon_sets} sets of measuring spoons is {num_spoon_sets} x ${price_per_spoon_set} = $<<{num_spoon_sets}*{price_per_spoon_set}={total_spoon_cost}>>{total_spoon_cost}.
